sentences: Tema eesmärksel on tagada turvalisuse tüta pakkuda.
Turvalisuse tähtsus majapidamises ei saa alahindada.
Pank pakub oma kliendi andmetele turvalisuse garantii.
context: Refers to the state of being protected or safe from harm, danger, or risk. It is commonly used in contexts involving safety measures, security systems, and protection against threats.
